thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zain Saudi Acquires Additional Spectrum

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zain Saudi Acquires Additional Spectrum
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - MOBILE TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMPANY SAUDI ARABIA:
* ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF ADDITIONAL SPECTRUM IN 800 MHZ FREQUENCY BAND
* SECURED SPECTRUM FOR PERIOD OF 15 YEARS, FOR TOTAL LICENSE FEE OF 84 MILLION RIYALS PAYABLE OVER 14 YEARS STARTING FROM JAN 01, 2019
* CO TO ALSO PAY ANNUAL USAGE FEE OF 54 MILLION RIYALS FOR THE SPECTRUM
* THIS SPECTRUM WILL BE AVAILABLE FROM SECOND HALF OF 2018 * CO WILL FUND TOTAL ANNUAL FEES FOR NEW SPECTRUM FROM OPERATING CASH FLOWS, EXISTING CASH RESERVES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
